SEARCH
Package com.poseidoncapitalsolutions.trading.controller

Class CurveController

java.lang.Object
com.poseidoncapitalsolutions.trading.controller.CurveController
@Controller public class CurveController extends Object
Controller responsible for handling operations related to CurvePoints. Provides endpoints for viewing, adding, updating, and deleting curve points.

  • Method Details

    • home

      @GetMapping("/curvePoint/list") public String home(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a list of all curve points.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to add the curve points to.
      Returns:
      The view name for the curve points page.

    • addBidForm

      @GetMapping("/curvePoint/add") public String addBidForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form to add a new curve point.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to add a new empty CurvePointDTO to.
      Returns:
      The view name for the curve point add form.

    • validate

      @PostMapping("/curvePoint/validate") public String validate(@ModelAttribute("newCurvePoint") @Valid @Valid CurvePointDTO curvePoint, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Validates and adds a new curve point.
      Parameters:
      curvePoint - The new CurvePointDTO to be added.
      result - The result of validating the curve point.
      model - The model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the curve point list page if successful, or the form page if validation fails.

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/curvePoint/update/{id}") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form to update an existing curve point.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the curve point to update.
      model - The model to add the existing curve point data to.
      Returns:
      The view name for the curve point update form.

    • updateBid

      @PostMapping("/curvePoint/update/{id}") public String updateBid(@PathVariable("id") int id, @ModelAttribute("updatedCurvePoint") @Valid @Valid CurvePointDTO updatedCurvePoint, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates an existing curve point.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the curve point to update.
      updatedCurvePoint - The updated CurvePointDTO.
      result - The result of validating the updated curve point.
      model - The model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the curve point list page if successful, or the form page if validation fails.

    • deleteBid

      @GetMapping("/curvePoint/delete/{id}") public String deleteBid(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Deletes a curve point by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the curve point to delete.
      model - The model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the curve point list page after deletion.
